base_prompt: Provide a SQL query to list all the unique values in a column named 'status' from a table called 'Orders'.

Can you tell me: Provide a SQL query to.description:
Sure! Here is a SQL query to list all the unique values in the 'status' column from the 'Orders' table:



This query will retrieve all distinct values from the 'status' column of the 'Orders' table.
Can you tell me: Provide a SQL query to.code:
sql
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM Orders;
